name: hurricane
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pok√©mon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.x-y: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.
